cast.name: 威廉·麦克纳马拉 William McNamara
帕特里夏·德·莱昂 Patricia De Leon
卡蒂亚·巴卡特 Katya Bakat

director.name: 大卫·德科提奥 David DeCoteau

introduction: Honeymoon in Paradise - 10 reality TV contestants excitedly arrive at the luxurious Coconut Bay Beach Resort and Spa nestled in beautiful Saint Lucia. Some of the contestants are secretly hoping to become media stars while others are truly looking for love. Five beautiful girls and five handsome guys -- who don't know each other - taking part in the new TV series --Honeymoon in Paradise. The grand prize is an all-expenses paid month long honeymoon and huge cash payout. For four days the ten participate in a series of dating encounters and relationship challenge, with a world-wide online audience daily voting to pair or separate couples. Day one, as the contestants are introduced, we meet Michael who is soon shocked as he spies Andrea, his ex from five years ago. She's one of the five women on the show. The two know if their secret -- that they know each other -- gets out, they'll be instantly disqualified, sent home and miss out on the prize money, fame and the Honeymoon in Paradise. However each realizes they still have feelings for the other. With microphones and cameras following the contestants 24/7 Andrea and Michael try to keep their feelings concealed from each other, the audience and the other contestants. Will Michael and Andrea let their true feelings be known to each other or will they be discovered and sent home, disqualified?
